text: The 2014–15 Hong Kong FA Cup Final was a football match that took place on 17 May 2015 at Mong Kok Stadium, Hong Kong. It was the final match of the 2014–15 Hong Kong FA Cup, a football competition including teams in the Hong Kong Premier League. ==Details== {| width=92% |- | | |} {| style="width:100%" |- |style="vertical-align:top;
